item.title: Report E-2024100485
item.description:
Report E-2024100485

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XDM experienced a UN3018 Pilot 4E release from a 330-gallon poly tote. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 4-gallons of product released to a 12’ x 3’ area of the trailer floor due to a crack on the top tote corner. The material was transferred from the damaged tote into a new one. The impacted area was then cleaned with absorbents. The damaged tote was then cut up and containerized along with all impacted absorbents into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
